name: Duskerton
description:
A murder has occurred in the seedy back streets of Duskerton, take control of the Private Investigator hired to discover who did the crime, and work with Lt. Crawford to interrogate the three suspects at hand; Howie Washington, the neighbor and friend of the victim, Agnes McMallen, the wife of the man who lies dead at your feet, and Luca Florentini, the bistro owner with a mysterious past. Find out which person committed this most heinous crime!

Trailer: 

Instructions for Play:

Walking is controlled by the WASD keys, and speaking to the select 4 NPCs can be done with the E key.

Creators:

Alex Dinsdale

Josh Liska

Gwen Parker

Tom Parker

Alice Ryan
